Sodium Scorpio's Green and Gray Checkered Bartender Trousers
kDesc
Wear this item with the Green and Gray Checkered Bartender Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
Portez ce pantalon avec la chemise à carreaux verts et gris de barman pour servir au bar Scorpio’s afin de gagner des crédits Sodium. [#Legal]
Trage diesen Artikel mit dem grün und grau karierten Barkeeper-Hemd, wenn du in Scorpio's Bar arbeitest, um Sodium-Credits zu verdienen. [#Legal]
Indossa questo articolo insieme alla camicia da barista a scacchi verdi e grigi mentre lavori al Bar Scorpio's per guadagnare Crediti Sodium. [#Legal]
Combínalos con la camisa de camarero con cuadros verdes y grises mientras trabajas en Scorpio's para conseguir créditos Sodium. [#Legal]
Scorpio's のバーで働いて Sodiumクレジットを稼ぐ際、このアイテムを着用しよう。 [#Legal]
이 긴바지를 녹/회색 체크무늬 바텐더 셔츠와 함께 입고 Scorpio's 바에서 일하면 Sodium 포인트를 적립할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Wear this item with the Green and Gray Checkered Bartender Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服及灰綠色調酒師格仔襯衫，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服及灰綠色調酒師格仔襯衫，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
Wear this item with the Green and Gray Checkered Bartender Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
